Content: Disable automatically sharing the Barter civil ability with the party.
Automatically share persuasion when dialog starts.
Share attitude gains between all party members.
The Pet Pal book will add Pet Pal tag instead of the actual talent, unless this is disabled. If disabled, the talent will be added instead.
If enabled, users can enable one-click sneaking for chained party members, allowing you to sneak/unsneak all connected characters with a single action.
If Sneaking Tweaks is globally enabled, this will disable it for all characters you control.
Prevent Bartering Tweaks books from appearing in traders.
